data.message: Wish I could still afford to see a doctor.  Guess that's not going to happen any time soon with Obamacare. $5,000 deductible

replies.message: Joann Davis Murphy    Put on some dirty clothes like you just wandered in, speak noooooo English and walk right into the ER . Nuff said
I'm lucky enough to stay in Scotland, a country where a free National Health Service exists- not much comfort but my heart goes out to you guys!! ('Don't know how you do it)
That's why I drop it, now I have no medical insurance either. Thanks for commenting on our worst presidential in the history of America's web page!
he wanted to be remember for what he did for the people,  and every one voted for him when he said bend over I am going to screw you.  and that is the only thing he was not lying about
